org.lenskit

Class LenskitRecommenderEngineBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.LenskitRecommenderEngineBuilder

  • public class LenskitRecommenderEngineBuilder
extends Object

    Builds LensKit recommender engines from configurations.

    If multiple configurations are used, later configurations superseded previous configurations. This allows you to add a configuration of defaults, followed by a custom configuration. The final build process takes the union of the roots of all provided configurations as the roots of the configured object graph.

    Since:
    2.1
    See Also:
    LenskitConfiguration, LenskitRecommenderEngine

        public ClassLoader getClassLoader()

        Get the class loader this builder will use. By default, it uses the thread’s current context class loader (if set).

        Returns:
        The class loader to be used.

      • addConfiguration

        public LenskitRecommenderEngineBuilder addConfiguration(LenskitConfiguration config)

        Add a configuration to be included in the recommender engine. This is the equivalent of calling addConfiguration(LenskitConfiguration, ModelDisposition) with the ModelDisposition.INCLUDED.

        Parameters:
        config - The configuration.
        Returns:
        The builder (for chaining).

        Add a configuration to be used when building the engine.

        Parameters:
        config - The configuration.
        disp - The disposition for this configuration.
        Returns:
        The builder (for chaining).

        Build the recommender engine.

      • build

        public LenskitRecommenderEngine build(DataAccessObject dao)
                               throws RecommenderBuildException

        Build the recommender engine.

        Parameters:
        dao - The data access object to use. Can be null to build without a DAO, but this is only useful in special cases.
        Returns:
        The built recommender engine, with excluded components removed.
        Throws:
        RecommenderBuildException
